resources.string: This service is used to communicate with Ethio Telecoms popups

ይህ አገልግሎት ደንበኞች በሚከተሉት ሁኔታዎች የሚመጣሎትን ጥሪ ወደ ሌላ ስልክ ለማስተላለፍ ያስችላቸዋል:: 
 • ከአገልግሎት መስጫ ክልል ውጪ ሲሆኑ
 • ስልኩ ካልተነሳ 
 • መስመሩ ሲያዝ
 • ለሁሉም ጥሪዎች
This service allows you to receive incoming call alerts while you are on a call.
This service allows you to leave a voice message when your mobile can not receive calls
This service notifies you of all the calls you have missed while you were not able to receive calls. This service uses SMS to notify you.
This service notifies you when the person you have been trying to call becomes available and is able to receive your call. This service also uses SMS to notify you.

string.name: snack_accessibility
string.b: Warning: some features of CreditPal won\'t work unless you enable accessibility setting for CreditPal, Please click on ACTIVATE and then in you device settings find CreditPal then enable it.
